replies.bodyText:
I automated what I could, i.e. the one of the form "string" + var
I did the end myself and checked that it compiles, I thought that I would get warning if this was not properly done, as with usual formatting rules

replies.bodyText: Somehow, I did not realize that double uses %f, and not %d
